

1. Hover over the risk area you want to add a guideline to until the **{{< fa ellipsis-vertical >}}** menu appears, then click on it.

1. Select **{{< fa plus >}} Add Guideline**.

1. Provide a **[title]{.smallcaps}** and **[description]{.smallcaps}** for your guideline.

1. Click **Add Guideline** to insert your guideline to that risk area.
